trans-unit.source: Configuring the Signavio Simulation Server (optional)

seg-source.mrk: Configuring the Signavio Simulation Server (optional)

target.mrk: Den Signavio Simulationsserver konfigurieren (optional)

trans-unit.source: The execution of process simulations is performed in a standalone web application that is usually deployed on the same Tomcat server as the rest of the application. To avoid an overload of the web server by a complex simulation scenario, a simulation instance will be canceled when reaching a preconfigured threshold. You can increase these thresholds on your own risk. To avoid an overload of the web server, you can also deploy the simulation component on a separate Tomcat server.

seg-source.mrk: The execution of process simulations is performed in a standalone web application that is usually deployed on the same Tomcat server as the rest of the application.
To avoid an overload of the web server by a complex simulation scenario, a simulation instance will be canceled when reaching a preconfigured threshold.
You can increase these thresholds on your own risk.
To avoid an overload of the web server, you can also deploy the simulation component on a separate Tomcat server.

target.mrk: Die Ausführung der Simulation von Prozessen erfolgt in einer eigenständigen Webapplikation, die standardmäßig auf demselben Tomcat-Server installiert wird, wie auch der Rest der Anwendung.
Um eine Überlastung des Webservers durch ein komplexes Simulationsszenario zu verhindern, werden Simulationsinstanzen bei Erreichen bestimmter vorkonfigurierter Grenzen abgebrochen.
Sie können diese Grenzen auf eigene Gefahr erhöhen.
Um eine Überlastung des Webservers zu verhindern,kann die Simulationskomponente außerdem auf einen eigenen Tomcat-Server ausgelagert werden.

trans-unit.source: Adjusting properties of the Signavio Simulation Server

seg-source.mrk: Adjusting properties of the Signavio Simulation Server

target.mrk: Die Eigenschaften des Signavio Simulationsservers konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: For this you need to adjust the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">simulation.xml</kbd> you find at <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: For this you need to adjust the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">simulation.xml</kbd> you find at <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Uncomment the respective XML-tags and fill the tags as follows:

seg-source.mrk: Uncomment the respective XML-tags and fill the tags as follows:

target.mrk: Entfernen Sie die Kommentierungszeichen der entsprechenden XML-Tags und passen die Tags wie folgt an:

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxResults</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxResults</kbd>:

trans-unit.source: Defines the maximum number of simulation results that will be cached in the Simulation Server at a time. The default value is 100.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the maximum number of simulation results that will be cached in the Simulation Server at a time.
The default value is 100.

target.mrk: Definiert das Maximum der Simulationsergebnisse, die vom Simulationsserver zu einem Zeitpunkt zwischengespeichert werden können.
Der Standardwert ist 100.

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxCachedInstances</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">maxCachedInstances</kbd>:

trans-unit.source:
Defines the maximum number of running simulation instances that will be cached in the Simulation Server at a time. The default value is 100.
$$\text{NrOfParallelNCaseRuns} \times \frac{maxLogEntries \times 15}{100.000}\text{MB}$$

seg-source.mrk: Defines the maximum number of running simulation instances that will be cached in the Simulation Server at a time.
The default value is 100.
$$\text{NrOfParallelNCaseRuns} \times \frac{maxLogEntries \times 15}{100.000}\text{MB}$$

target.mrk: Definiert das Maximum der laufenden Simulationsinstanzen, die vom Simulationsserver zu einem Zeitpunkt zwischengespeichert werden können.
Der Standardwert ist 100.

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">resultTimeout</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">resultTimeout</kbd>:

trans-unit.source: Defines the amount of time (seconds) until a simulation result is considered as old and can be deleted. The default value is 600.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the amount of time (seconds) until a simulation result is considered as old and can be deleted.
The default value is 600.

target.mrk: Definiert den Zeitraum (in Sekunden) nach dem ein Simulationsergebnis als ‘alt’ angesehen wird und gelöscht werden kann.
Der Standardwert ist 600.

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">instanceTimeout</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">instanceTimeout</kbd>:

trans-unit.source: Defines the amount of time (seconds) until a simulation instance is considered as old and can be deleted. The default value is 600.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the amount of time (seconds) until a simulation instance is considered as old and can be deleted.
The default value is 600.

target.mrk: Definiert den Zeitraum (in Sekunden) nach dem eine Simulationsinstanz als ‘alt’ angesehen wird und gelöscht werden kann.
Der Standardwert ist 600.

trans-unit.source: If you want to run the simulation server with the defaults, you don’t need to edit the values after uncommenting them.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to run the simulation server with the defaults, you don’t need to edit the values after uncommenting them.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie den Simulationsserver mit den Standardeinstellungen betreiben möchten, brauchen Sie nach der Entfernung der Kommentierungszeichen die Einstellungen nicht anzupassen.

trans-unit.source: Installing Signavio Simulation Server in a separate Tomcat instance (optional)

seg-source.mrk: Installing Signavio Simulation Server in a separate Tomcat instance (optional)

target.mrk: Signavio Simulationsserver in einem separaten Tomcat installieren (optional)

trans-unit.source: In most cases it is not necessary to install the Signavio Simulation Server on a separate Tomcat. The only good reason for doing so is to prevent performance problems if both of the following conditions are valid:

seg-source.mrk: In most cases it is not necessary to install the Signavio Simulation Server on a separate Tomcat.
The only good reason for doing so is to prevent performance problems if both of the following conditions are valid:

target.mrk: In den meisten Fällen ist es nicht notwendig den Signavio Simulationsserver in einem separaten Tomcat zu installieren.
Valide Gründe hierfür gibt es nur, wenn die folgenden Bedingungen beide zutreffen:

trans-unit.source: You have purchased the Enterprise Edition.

seg-source.mrk: You have purchased the Enterprise Edition.

target.mrk: Sie verwenden die Enterprise Edition.

trans-unit.source: Many of your business process modelers are frequently using the n-case simulation feature.

seg-source.mrk: Many of your business process modelers are frequently using the n-case simulation feature.

target.mrk: Viele Ihrer Geschäftsprozessmodellierer verwenden regelmäßig das n-case Simulationsfeature.

trans-unit.source: In order to run the Simulation server on a separate Tomcat, install the Tomcat and configure it just as the Signavio Tomcat (see: <MadCap:xref href="configure-web-server.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the web server</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: In order to run the Simulation server on a separate Tomcat, install the Tomcat and configure it just as the Signavio Tomcat (see: <MadCap:xref href="configure-web-server.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the web server</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: In case the second Tomcat runs on the same server/VM, please make sure it is running on a different port than the Signavio Tomcat.

seg-source.mrk: In case the second Tomcat runs on the same server/VM, please make sure it is running on a different port than the Signavio Tomcat.

target.mrk: Sollte der zweite Tomcat auf demselben Server/in derselben VM laufen, stellen Sie sicher, dass die Ports der beiden Tomcat Server nicht identisch sind.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to always update Signavio Process Manager together with the Simulation Server. Different versions are incompatible with each other.

seg-source.mrk: Make sure to always update Signavio Process Manager together with the Simulation Server.
Different versions are incompatible with each other.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher, dass bei einem Update des Signavio Process Managers auch der Simulationsserver aktualisiert wird.
Unterschiedliche Versionen sind zueinander inkompatibel.

trans-unit.source: Now, proceed as follows:

seg-source.mrk: Now, proceed as follows:

target.mrk: Gehen Sie abschließend wie folgt vor:

trans-unit.source: Stop the Tomcats (if running).

seg-source.mrk: Stop the Tomcats (if running).

target.mrk: Stoppen Sie die Tomcat Server, falls diese zur Zeit laufen.

trans-unit.source: Move (not copy!) the folder simulationservice from the webapps-directory of the Signavio Tomcat to the webapps directory of the Simulation Server Tomcat.

seg-source.mrk: Move (not copy!) the folder simulationservice from the webapps-directory of the Signavio Tomcat to the webapps directory of the Simulation Server Tomcat.

trans-unit.source:
Adjust the file simulation.xml you find at \conf. Uncomment the corresponding XML-tags and fill the tags as follows:
  • host : Defines the host name of the server where the Simulation Server is deployed, for example http://mysignaviosimulationservice:8180 .
  • path : Defines the URL path at which the Simulation Server is deployed, normally /simulationservice/.

seg-source.mrk: Adjust the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">simulation.xml</kbd> you find at <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><signavio-tomcat>\conf</kbd>.
Uncomment the corresponding XML-tags and fill the tags as follows:
<li><kbd> host </kbd>: Defines the host name of the server where the Simulation Server is deployed, for example <kbd> http://mysignaviosimulationservice:8180 </kbd>.
<li><kbd> path </kbd>: Defines the URL path at which the Simulation Server is deployed, normally <kbd> /simulationservice/</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Start both Tomcats (the order does not matter).

seg-source.mrk: Start both Tomcats (the order does not matter).

target.mrk: Starten Sie die beiden Tomcat Server (die Reihenfolge spielt keine Rolle).
